name: Tethered (itch) (Tortrax_TR)
description:
Play together and against your friends in a race to catch falling stars!

You're stuck in the orbit of a black hole, with your friend/enemy by your side. Both of you know that you need to cooperate to gather the resources that are falling into the black hole; but both of you also know that only one of you gets to escape tbe orbit!

Play together AND against another player in this dire space adventure!
